dataTemplate.name: BCO_VGM_INFORMATION
dataTemplate.description: BCO VGM Information Not Submitted for Outbound Shipments

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT srn.shipment_refnum_value booking_no, s.shipment_xid shipment_id, cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value vgm_cut_date, cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value vgm_cut_time, cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value doc_cut_date, cvr4.charter_voyage_refnum_value ramp_cut_date, TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM/DD/YY') sail_date, TO_CHAR(s.port_discharge_eta, 'MM/DD/YY') eta_date, glog_util.remove_domain(s.servprov_gid) carrier, loc1.location_xid source_location, loc2.location_xid dest_location, sref1.shipment_refnum_value loc_code, loc3.location_xid load_port FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_status ss ON s.shipment_gid = ss.shipment_gid AND ss.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.VGM_INFORMATION' AND ss.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.VGM_INFORMATION_NOT_SUBMITTED' INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON ss.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid AND orel.order_release_xid like 'S%' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON srn.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VGM CLOSING TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VGM CLOSING TIME_HHMM' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_DOC CLOSING TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr4 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr4.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr4.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_START RAMP CUTOFF TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON s.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON s.port_of_load_location_gid = loc3.location_gid WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND loc3.country_code3_gid = 'CAN' AND TO_DATE(s.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE('2016-06-15','YYYY-MM-DD') AND (cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value IS NULL OR (NOT cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value IS NULL AND (TO_DATE(TRIM(TRIM(cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value) || ' ' || TRIM(NVL(cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value,'00:01'))),'MM/DD/YY HH24:MI') <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+3,'dd-mm-rr HH24:MI'),'DD/MM/YY HH24:MI')))) ORDER BY TO_DATE(TRIM(TRIM(cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value)),'MM/DD/YY') DESC, cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value DESC
